title: Props as Functions or Callbacks
description: Pass a method as a prop and execute in the child

title: TaskGrid layout instead of floating on top
description: If your modal is showing inside the TaskGrid layout instead of floating on top, despite using <teleport to="body">, the issue is almost certainly CSS-related. Specifically, your modal's container likely does not break out of its parent layout stacking context, often caused by missing or incorrect z-index, position, or container overflow rules

title: Common Causes
description:
Key Points
Concept	Explanation
props	Way to pass data from parent to child
One-way data flow	Props are read-only in child components
Type checking	Helps avoid unexpected bugs with prop validation
